citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15pm on 12-APR-
22. Licensee was contacted by phone but was not available to conduct an inspection within a 1-hour time frame.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:15pm on 12-APR-
22. Licensee was contacted by phone but was not available to conduct an inspection within a 1-hour time frame. 
 
 
 
End Section
